TopicTitle: Any rotating dishes as a mod?

Articles.Content: Ok so I'm curious to see if there are any mods that have dishes rotating, if there isn't any of them then i'm ok with that, i'm only curious if there are rotating antennas and dishes as a mod.

Stock narrowband scanner is rotating when you activate the scan function (it doesn't look like dishes,but it still makes a good aesthetic for creating radar tower for ship)

BDArmory have several radar dishes, but I don't know whether they rotate or not (I never used them since I'm more interested in blowing things up ), but there's a radome unit for AWACS aircraft too which does rotate if you activate the function

Yup, the BDA dishes can rotate.  And they actually function as radar.  But the parts are kinda bulky IIRC, and wouldn't fit very well on a spacecraft, they're designed more for mobile bases or ships. 

BonVoyage has a little rotating dish that's kinda cute, but it's small. 

I dunno of any that are of stockish size and rotate, but I would not be surprised to see a few out there already.
Or put a stock antenna on a structural assembly connected to rotating infernal robotics part to create an improvised rotating antenna array
